title: user registration functionality
description: Test the /api/register endpoint to ensure new users can register successfully with valid fullName, email, and password, and that invalid or missing data is handled properly.

title: user login functionality
description: Test the /api/login endpoint to verify users can log in with correct email and password, and that incorrect credentials are rejected with appropriate error messages.

title: password reset otp sending
description: Test the /api/verify-email endpoint to confirm that a password reset OTP is sent to the provided email if it exists, and proper error handling for invalid or unregistered emails.

title: password reset otp verification
description: Test the /api/verify-otp endpoint to verify that the OTP provided for password reset is validated correctly for the given email, including handling of expired or incorrect OTPs.

title: password reset functionality
description: Test the /api/reset-password endpoint to ensure users can reset their password using a valid OTP and new password, and that invalid OTPs or weak passwords are rejected.

title: transaction creation
description: Test the POST /api/transactions endpoint to verify that authenticated users can create new financial transactions with valid amount, category, description, and date.

title: transaction retrieval
description: Test the GET /api/transactions endpoint to ensure authenticated users can retrieve all their transactions and that the response data is accurate and complete.

title: transaction update and deletion
description: Test the PATCH and DELETE /api/transactions/{id} endpoints to verify that authenticated users can update and delete specific transactions by ID, with proper authorization and error handling.

title: transaction export functionality
description: Test the GET /api/transactions/export endpoint to confirm that authenticated users can export their transactions in CSV, PDF, and Excel formats, and that the exported files are correctly formatted.

title: budget management operations
description: Test the /api/budgets endpoints (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) to verify that authenticated users can create, retrieve, update, and delete budgets, including category budgets and total budget limits.
